rules: Rule1: If the vaccine candidate is approved, then vaccine doses are distributed
Rule2: Either the vaccine candidate is approved, or if the simulation model is running, then the disease outbreak is contained
Rule3: If the FDA application is rejected, then the vaccine candidate is not approved
Rule4: Either the FDA application is rejected or clinical trials are halted
Rule5: If clinical trials are halted, then the vaccine candidate is not approved
Rule6: If emergency funding is authorized, then diagnostic sensors are calibrated
Rule7: Either emergency funding is authorized or research budget is allocated
Rule8: If research budget is allocated, then whenever the threat database is updated, the disease outbreak is contained
Rule9: If medical data is encrypted, then the database contains patient records
Rule10: If cloud servers are secured, then the disease outbreak is contained
Rule11: If the contact tracing module is accessible, then the database contains patient records
Rule12: Either the contact tracing module is accessible or the prediction algorithm is operational
Rule13: If a cyber attack is detected, then hacker access is blocked
Rule14: Either a cyber attack is detected or malware is identified
Rule15: If malware is identified, then the security system is not breached
Rule16: If hacker access is blocked, then the security system is not breached
Rule17: If the virus genome is analyzed, then a mutation pattern is identified
Rule18: If genetic research is funded, then research findings are published
Rule19: Either genetic research is funded or the bioinformatics team is supported
Rule20: If the bioinformatics team is supported, then whenever a mutation pattern is identified, the emergency protocol is activated
Rule21: If the prediction algorithm is operational, then the disease outbreak is contained
Rule22: If research findings are published, then whenever a mutation pattern is identified, the emergency protocol is activated
Rule23: If side effects are discovered, then whenever the vaccine candidate is approved, vaccine doses are not distributed
Rule24: If adverse reactions are reported, then whenever the vaccine candidate is approved, vaccine doses are not distributed
Rule25: If vaccine safety is monitored, then either side effects are discovered or adverse reactions are reported
Rule26: Either medical staff are trained or healthcare workers are educated
Rule27: If healthcare workers are educated, then whenever the threat database is updated, the disease outbreak is contained
Rule28: If triage protocol is implemented, then whenever medical staff are not trained to ensure that threat database updates lead to disease containment, the hospital system becomes overwhelmed
Rule29: If crisis management is activated, then triage protocol is implemented
Rule30: If the emergency protocol is activated, then whenever patient zero is not infected and the disease outbreak is not contained, patient zero is not quarantined
Rule31: If the diagnostic toolkit is deployed, then the emergency protocol is activated
Rule32: Either the diagnostic toolkit is deployed or the AI scanner is functional
Rule33: If the AI scanner is functional, then the emergency protocol is activated
Rule34: If medical data is not encrypted and cloud servers are not secured, then the security system is breached
Rule35: If medical staff are not trained to ensure that threat database updates lead to disease containment, then the hospital system does not become overwhelmed
Rule36: If patient zero is not infected and the disease outbreak is not contained, then patient zero is quarantined

Rule37: If it is not the case that when outbreak source is not verified and when patient zero is not infected and disease is not contained then patient zero is not quarantined leads to zoonotic transmission confirmation, then an animal reservoir is established

Rule38: If it is not the case that when outbreak source is not verified and when patient zero is not infected and disease is not contained then patient zero is not quarantined leads to zoonotic transmission confirmation, then an animal reservoir is not established
Rule39: If vaccine safety is not monitored, then a safety warning is issued
Rule40: If vaccine safety is not monitored, then a safety warning is not issued
facts: Fact1: The threat database is updated
Fact2: The virus genome is analyzed
Fact4: The simulation model is running
Fact5: The database does not contain patient records
Fact6: Diagnostic sensors are not calibrated
Fact7: The outbreak source is not verified
Fact8: Zoonotic transmission is not confirmed
Fact9: Patient zero is not infected
